website_summaries.verdict: An excellent quality 32-inch curved monitor that offers a great picture but won't break the bank.
pros: Includes HDMI, VGA, and DisplayPort inputs
Features blue light shift to reduce eye fatigue
Compatible with Windows 7 and above and OS X El Capitan and above
cons: Most buyers found the need to adjust the default settings to get a better black color display

customer_reviews.title: Great display! Make sure to Adjust a Few Settings to get the Most out of it!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome display and clear picture and text. No bleeding. Make sure you change your pixel format or the picture will and text will bleed and be blurry.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mancini

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor
customer_reviews.text: WOW! I am a huge PC gamer, and this monitor is boss! It is not perfect, regarding having vsync and some of the newer technology that many monitors are using to keep up with graphics. However, bottom-line, this monitor is clear, incredible quality, bright, and SPEAKERS ARE INSTALLED in the monitor! You cannot beat the price. I have been very happy and I wouldn't have it any other way! I would definitely buy again. I am gaming on GTX 1080, i7 6700k, and 16 gb ram
customer_reviews.author: Gerry

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2 of these monitors. Hooked both of them ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these monitors. Hooked both of them up and they are both clouding all around the corners and edges. Can't even watch a movie and it's very distracting. I tried adjusting all the settings and nothing changed. Get what you pay for I guess....
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Do not expect good customer service from Sceptre after they do fail
customer_reviews.text: Bought one of these a while ago. As with other sceptre products (and I own a few) they are cheap, operational and functional. Do not expect to get a long lifetime out of these. They're practically made to fail within a year. Do not expect good customer service from Sceptre after they do fail, they deny anything is wrong. Replacements are not replacements, they are the same screens with the software on the boards wiped, even after confirming its a hardware issue (and it almost always is the capacitors). tl:dr - buy this if you're looking for a holdover. Spend a little extra money for a more reliable brand.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: considering its price--- it is still bad---not usable
customer_reviews.text: considering its price--- it is still bad. Pixel yes you can see them when you watch pictures not even HD pictures. The color is so bad--- the screen looks so gray even you have a graphic card and you think digital vibrance can do the trick? No a chance. I would just buy something else this is waste of money and probably gonna destroy your eyes. But it could be good if there is no comparison--- sadly I have Samsung screens so you tell the difference in seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Zhang Xiaoyu

customer_reviews.title: I didn’t take great pics but the monitor is completely worth it
customer_reviews.text: Very nice monitor for the price I’m running it with a gtx 1060 g1 3gb the test game is gta and it looks really sweet very good quality and for browsing the internet it is very nice and clear the wording is crisp for a 32in monitor will update if anything changes but so far no regrets Update: Still doing good highly recommend this monitor
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Beware no quality control.. 1st and last time buying this Brand They dont even deserve 1 star rating.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the Monitor 2 months ago and didnt open box till I get all parts for new pc im building and now realize this is DOA... Well the power led comes on but no picture, it has a blue background glow but thats about it.. the buttons on the back dont work because no menu comes up.. UPDATE: Sceptre repaired the monitor and they send back the wrong bracket for the stand.. Called them and they are going to mail one out to me. MORE WAITING for a monitor I still didnt even get to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jorg

customer_reviews.title: two monitors, first one came with a lighting issue ...
customer_reviews.text: two monitors, first one came with a lighting issue which made it unusable at night, the second one came with a dead pixel. do not buy from this company
customer_reviews.author: Anshuman Bhusal

customer_reviews.title: Better than the Samsung and LG 32"
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for $180 on prime day, whereas I was viewing an LG and Samsung for the same spec for $250+. This monitor has had no flaws, the picture quality is great for it's size and the color settings are superb. Even at $250 I'd take this over the LG, it's neck and neck with the Samsung. Keep in mind for such a big monitor at 1080P and no G/Vsync it's not going to be crystal clear like you would get on a 24"/27" but if you're on a budget and not a complete graphic snob it is a great gaming monitor. (Primarily playing first person shooter's with no complaints of monitor latency).
customer_reviews.author: Thalgoraguitarist

customer_reviews.title: Can I rate it 0 stars...?
customer_reviews.text: I'm now disappointed with two monitors. Both the first monitor I ordered and the replacement they sent me have the same problem: It powers on, the speakers work, but no picture. There's no Sceptre logo or anything. I can see it light up, but nothing appears on the screen. Is it possible that my luck is just THAT bad? The only positive is that they sent the replacement really quickly. On the other hand, I wouldn't mind waiting an extra day to have them test the monitor to make sure it works. It seems like Sceptre's quality control is just awful... I'm going to send both monitors back for a refund and choose a better company.
customer_reviews.author: The_Carr

customer_reviews.title: It’s Alright
customer_reviews.text: This monitor has built in speakers; don’t use them. It’d only be useful for beeps or something mundane like that. The monitor is alright. Nothing awful about it. Been using it for a year and a half for work. Gets the job done. I give this monitor 5 out of 5 for brightness because it’s bright. Whitewashes everything. If you game, don’t buy this monitor. If you are using it for work, it’s alright. But at this size I’d recommend jumping for a 1440p monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Nitsu

customer_reviews.title: Nice monitor, good speakers
customer_reviews.text: My son uses this mostly for gaming and loves the new monitor. He likes the curvature and likes being able to keep chat open on his old monitor while gaming on this one. He rates it as a 4 out of 5 due to an aspect change on how browsing tabs are shown much smaller on this one, but is very pleased with it overall. I was very pleased with the price and quick delivery during the holidays
customer_reviews.author: Larry Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Nvidia driver issues.
customer_reviews.text: For whatever reason Nvidia drivers on my pc didn't play well with these monitors. There was a green glow around the edges that I swore was backlight bleed in. I noticed that it dissappeared one time when I brought my pc up in safe mode. I fiddled and Googled and asked on various forums and everyone insisted that's what it was and I got zero response from the manufacturer and was thinking about replacing them. I upgraded to a new Radeon card yesterday. The green glow is gone, the picture looks great now. *shrugs*
customer_reviews.author: Bluerunner

customer_reviews.title: Sceptre Customer Support is a Joke
customer_reviews.text: I bought this monitor in March and it came with a screen defect that caused one inch of dead pixels along the right side of the screen. I’ve been communicating with Sceptre since April. It is now August. My monitor is still sitting repackaged in the box waiting to be shipped for repairs or replacement. This company is an absolute nightmare. The monitor itself is fine, but if I’d known that the warranty was useless, I would have just bought a Samsung or Toshiba. I’d avoid Sceptre products if you’re hoping they’ll have any sort of longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Rohini Venkat

customer_reviews.title: Works just fine for what the price
customer_reviews.text: The first Screen I received was disappointing , there was a yellow bar on the screen that prevented me from reading my manuscripts. I spent an hour trying to find a solution and did not. Ok, Amazon was in charge of the product, therefore, they sent me back a new one, in no time. The new one works perfectly. The definition could be better, but it is a good product for the price (I still had to by a cord to connect t to my computer).
customer_reviews.author: Blue Charleston

customer_reviews.title: Monitor is Garbage, Company is even worse
customer_reviews.text: Worked okay until I realized that I couldn't change the inputs. Then after I did a workaround to use it, the monitor consistently was inconsistent in regards to staying on and even turning on. in the course of now over a YEAR AND A HALF, I still have not been able to get it fixed under warranty and have been lied to by 5+ people in the customer service department. This is after several months of not being able to receive a response or someone to even talk to. Horrible Company, HARD PASS on ANYTHING from this company. I wouldn't buy a mouse from this company more or less anything more than $20 again.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Cromer

customer_reviews.title: Good Monitor.  HORRID TECH SUPPORT.
customer_reviews.text: The monitor works great and is a good buy for the money. The reason for the two stars is the horrid tech support. The rudest most unhelpful people at Sceptre. It was clear that the man I spoke to was not interested in anyway to help me. He kept saying TV not monitor and was telling me to push buttons with certain symbols on them, which is impossible to know because the buttons are on the back of the monitor. It's a good monitor but be warned not to expect to much from tech support if you should need them.
customer_reviews.author: shanedavenport

customer_reviews.title: Defective, bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Either received a defective one or the build quality is just horrible. I guess I can't really comment on the bad screen picture as again, my unit might have just been defective. Consistently power-cycled every few seconds, regardless of inputs. See pictures of bezels not even wrapped to the screen, plastic bezels are not remotely flush. Maybe these have the capacity to be decent budget screens, but it's time and money out of your day taking a chance on whether or not it will work. So - good luck. Returned and got a much better-looking Dell 32" IPS screen (D3218HN) from Costco for the same price.
customer_reviews.author: TurboDog

customer_reviews.title: Curved monitor FTW!!
customer_reviews.text: I own a 32" flat screen monitor prior to this and even though they're the same size, this curved display makes it seems like I have a bigger monitor now and things a whole new look. Never been sold on curved stuff, but for a monitor it's awesome. Price is legit too!! Word of advice, don't use a 720p TV for a monitor. I attempted this with the Sceptre 32" TV and quality was horrible so it'll be going out in the shop and this MONITOR will replace it
customer_reviews.author: InfiniteReality

customer_reviews.title: Ordered 4 C325W-1920R
customer_reviews.text: I debated for a while to before selecting these monitors. I have no regrets. Pros: They are huge. I underestimated the size. 75 Hz Beautiful picture after adjusting the color settings. Perfect curve Cons: I received 1 of the 4 that was registered as a T32 and not a C32. This monitor would not go up to 75Hz and the colors looked washed out. The default color settings on the monitors is bad. I had to adjust the nVidia color setting to get it right. A quick youtube search fixed that. 75hz was not the default option in Windows 10. I had to change this in the advanced resolution options.
customer_reviews.author: JohnSmith

customer_reviews.title: Backlight bleeding, still completely worth it for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty noticable backlight bleed at the top corners and middle of the monitor, HDMI gives me washed out gray instead of black while VGA gives decent blacks. Honestly my only qualm with it is the bleeding which is very noticeable when playing games or watching shows with darker backgrounds. For the sake of transparency, the speakers are not the best but at the price point its a premium and I use a soundbar regardless. Im giving it 3 stars though because the color of the monitor really is pretty vibrant if you can fix some settings and the curvature is actually pretty immersive. I really like that this monitor has VESA mounting capabilities as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Cantillo

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE OF DAMAGED PRODUCTS
customer_reviews.text: My first Sceptre laptop arrived cracked and I returned the product. I waited for a week for my second Sceptre monitor and it have flickering screen. I tried to call Amazon support to fix the problem. In the end, it sound like I need to return the monitor again. Absolute trash, i am not going to wait another week for the monitor to be fixed again. 3 weeks of defective trash!!!! I will never buy another monitor on Amazon again!!
customer_reviews.author: Ben56

customer_reviews.title: Colors are very washed.
customer_reviews.text: The first thing to note about this monitor is that it is not ideal for gaming. It's overall color performance was pretty low. After using it for a few hours, I went on amazon and ordered the Samsung 32-Inch Curved Monitor (Ultra- Slim Design) (LC32F391FWNXZA) and applied for a return of the Sceptre. Reading text is difficult, colors are washed out, although some improvement is gained by lowering the brightness significantly. If you can afford to spend 70 dollars more for a better product, I recomend you do so. If you can't, just go with a flat screen and get better performance.
customer_reviews.author: JMR

customer_reviews.title: Awesome screens
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these screens and they are simply amazing. They have a wonderful crisp look for the picture quality and there were no issues attaching them to my computer. I love that they are bigger screens so that when I am watching tv, playing games, or doing homework, I can see what I'm doing. Not to mention the curve on the screen is appealing to the eyes and create a well rounded picture. No pun intended. I recommend this buyer and this screen, especially if you are on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Aurora Collins

customer_reviews.title: the picture is much like others have stated
customer_reviews.text: For the price, its about what you would expect, as other 32" Curved Monitors with a much clearer picture sell for $400+ That being said, the picture is much like others have stated, almost blurry, not sharp at all, no matter what you end up doing to the settings. Running this monitor on a HP Omen Gaming Computer, so its definitely not the source! If you want to save money and looking for a cheap monitor, you found it, if you want clarity and eye popping visuals, spend more :)
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Linux Compatible Great Displays at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my new Linux Lab setup, with a nVidia GTX 960 GPU. They work great at 1920x1080 HD @ 75 Hz with the native Linux drivers. They were packed extremely well with no quality issues. They plug and play, settings buttons are on the back of the monitor, but turn up the volume on the speakers before complaining about the sound. They have display port and hdmi port, which I use a two way switch to connect my laptops to, keeping the HD resolution at 75 HZ.
customer_reviews.author: kernel_panic

customer_reviews.title: Not Sceptre's best
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed with Sceptre on this one. I have setup and owned many of their displays and this one has a washed out screen. Black is not true black, and the screen is not very sharp. Other than that, it's a nice looking curved monitor if you are not too picky with quality. I went from a 32" LG 1080p TV to this Monitor, and honestly the TV was a better monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great looking screen
customer_reviews.text: Great looking screen, has 1 hdmi, 1 dvi, 1 vga, 1 aux. It works well for me but I wish that it would switch sources when I use both vga and hdmi. I use the vga for my computer and hdmi for ps4, but I can't switch to the other when both are on, so that is really annoying. Another not so good thing about this screen is that the blacks are really bad. Hard to watch certain shows/movies. For gaming it is ok because I can adjust the settings in games, but I can't do that for shows/movies.
customer_reviews.author: JunAKAJeff

customer_reviews.title: This is what I bought
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is very sleek looking and user friendly. Great picture, sleek looking, choices of picture quality. Great for gaming with a console, perfect size. Overall this monitor is very self explanatory and very nice in conjunction with everyday use such as games and work. It has smart sense which can see which output is being used at the time it knows which one you want to use.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa O

customer_reviews.title: I then adjusted the gamma in the video controls in windows for fine tweaking. First one came with a tiny hole ...
customer_reviews.text: A little tricky to set up, i finally settled on RTS mode with sRGB coloration. I then adjusted the gamma in the video controls in windows for fine tweaking. First one came with a tiny hole in the outer film which caused an inverted spot as it didn't have the polarization screen there either, but Amazon got me a replacement as fast as the original after I tried living with it and decided my (in)sanity was much too important to me. So far it's been good for graphics, games, video... anything I can throw at it.
customer_reviews.author: Azmaria Dei Post

customer_reviews.title: Good Picture, Where is Sound???
customer_reviews.text: The size a picture from the is great, however, after only having it a few weeks the sound stopped working. I have yet to figure out why the sound won't work and am close to giving up. Update: I can hookup Bluetooth headphones and I get sound great. There is obviously something wrong with this monitor. Unfortunately I was already past returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Hugo Hastings

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Pretty Darned Good
customer_reviews.text: I have absolutely nothing bad to say about this monitor. I got it for analyzing market charts, and it works wonderfully for that purpose. I can also turn down the blue light, which helps my eyes a good bit, especially in the middle of the night. I've had it for a few months now, and like I stated in the opening, have absolutely nothing bad to say about it. This is a quality monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Josh B.

customer_reviews.title: Would buy any day!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had no issues ever since I opened the box. It worked great at the start and still continues to do so. Nice size and nice picture quality, I have no complaints with anything. One thing I was shocked about is the speakers, they aren’t terribly loud or Great but having speakers in your monitor is already a boost from a monitor with no sound output. I plan on buying another one and putting them in a wall mount to have one big screen!
customer_reviews.author: Josh Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a NEW monitor, the box arrived appearing as if it had previously been opened and then taped backed together. Similarly, the screen and other parts in the box were in already-opened plastic bags, which were taped back together. Pieces necessary to assemble the screen were missing. This was advertised as NEW. When I turned on the screen, not only did it not work, but there were scratches on the screen. I contacted Sceptre customer services by email and by phone several times. No one picked up the phone calls, and nobody responded to my emails. Terrible experience.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Power Cord. and other tips.
customer_reviews.text: 1) The cord is inside the white foam in the box, it not come inside the bag with the other cable. 2) After you enter to your windows OS account verify the text, font and app setting is configure a 100%, my card for some reason changed to 125% after I plug this monitor. 3) If you have a Nvida card, in this case both of mine 980 and 1070 have and option that allow you to configure a custom resolution in case the max resolution on your selection box is 1080P.
customer_reviews.author: Pavel Ubiera

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor, great price
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these and have dual display setup and absolutely love them. I use them mainly for business, graphic design, page layout, email and such. Very bright, clear and after almost a year, they have worked perfectly. It would be nice if the power cord was longer since it is a non-traditional plug, but other than that, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron L

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Not the sharpest picture, or has great colour. Blacks are very grey. Default settings are horrible. Gamma, contrast and saturation need to be adjusted to get an OK image. Not good for mission critical applications, but passable for daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Sad

customer_reviews.title: Great Value - Curved Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this purchase. Excellent value for a 32" curved monitor. As others have noted, it will require numerous setting adjustments to optimize the display. Only complaint, the rear mounted controls are in an awkward location and adjustments aren't very intuitive. Manual instructions are poor. Also, connecting cables were included and not noted in the product description. This resulted in an unnecessary cable purchase.
customer_reviews.author: glkventura

customer_reviews.title: Sceptre
customer_reviews.text: a good inexpensive monitor. I use this with my samsung 32 inch curved monitor. I am pleased to find that the manufacturer updated the software to enable it to go into suspend or sleep mode and not require reaching behind the monitor which is a pain with my first unit. Only wish that the vendor would come out with a way to do the same on my first unit.
customer_reviews.author: burnt thumbs

customer_reviews.title: Very nice monitor - stand is a bit wobbly when I bump my desk
customer_reviews.text: Very nice monitor. As others have said the text is a bit blurry - it seems 27" is the optimal size for 1080p. However I only really notice this when I'm up close. And even then it's easily tolerable. Unpacking and setup was simple. The stand is a bit wobbly but so is my desk. When I get a new desk I fully expect the wobbling to go away. 4 stars is too low for this product - specially given the amazing price. Due to the wobbling I would prefer to do 4.5 stars but that's not an option. I would purchase these again without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: jasonb

customer_reviews.title: Best Bang for Your Buck
customer_reviews.text: This monitor looks amazing at first I was skeptical because of the price it came at but for a curved monitor at 60hz you cannot get a better deal the brightness is great, it auto sleeps and wakes up (there is a small blue light that stays on but I covered it up with a pice of duct tape and it did the job, that is my only complaint), and it seems very true to color. If there are any change (like pixel deaths) I will update my review accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: It Works and is Inexpensive for 32" Monitors
customer_reviews.text: I've been fairly happy with this purchase and hey. for the price, it can't be beat . I plan on getting another one to replace my old 27" monitor (which was what my purchase of the first one was for). It on the bright-side when first set up, but an adjustment to the brightness worked that out. The only frustrating thing is that it's not compatible with Windows 10 Night Light.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Richter

customer_reviews.title: Sceptre 32 inch Curved Monitor offers an immersive viewing experience
customer_reviews.text: I just got this monitor yesterday and have been using it for working with two applications on the screen at the same time. It does its job well and the price was outstanding.The monitor comes with an HDMI and a VGA cable and Phillips head screwdriver for really simple assembly. I did not notice when I made the purchase that the monitor has a build in speaker a nice surprise for me, I have used Excel, Word, CAD, and Skype so far no blurring a sharp clear screen. The huge 32-inch curved display gives me a great viewing experience. I even watched a movie on it
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice monitor for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price you can't beat this monitor. Pros: big screen, adjustable brightness/contrast and modes allow you to tweak it to your satisfaction. Win 10 ClearText helps too. VESA support was a must. Cons: default display mode "Eco" was much too dim. Only two screws were included for the VESA mount. Had to rummage in my garage to find two similar screws.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great purchase , 32 inch curved for this price, :)
customer_reviews.text: this was a great purchase , 32 inch curved for this price, great deal, and its so crisp, I've tested from work apps/tools to top games at ultra high, no issues, I did purchase 2 of these monitors, wish I bought 3, I will be after the holidays, I highly recommend this item to all
customer_reviews.author: Curtis L. Morton

customer_reviews.title: Pretty darn good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, not a gamer, I use this for engineering work. Especially liked the blue light adjustment feature since I'm staring at 50hrs a wk. I'm going to wait another month before I order a second one just to be sure. 2nd review This Is a follow up, very happy with it I'm ordering a second one
customer_reviews.author: Chucktx

customer_reviews.title: REALLY NICE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know how I would like a curved screen but it sounded so cool, I had to try it. I'm not sure I would like it for creating graphics since it might distort the sides but that wasn't my purpose. I love it. It IS cool but when sitting close to the screen, the curve is really helpful. The l,w price make me a little nervous but the unit works great.
customer_reviews.author: J. S. Spence

customer_reviews.title: Sceptre 32 inch curved review...
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor takes a bit to get it set up correctly but that's a one time deal... The HDMI cable sent with it the connectors are short and couldn't use it on my computer with the video card that's installed... but I had one so it worked out... came with VGA cord also.... it's packed well so shipping is not an issue... all in all I am satisfied and would buy again if need be... Keep up the good work sceptre your improving...
customer_reviews.author: Jelawman

customer_reviews.title: Good monitor for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was shopping for a new monitor and thought it would be cool to have a curved screen for a change. It isnt one of those "wow" curved screen but it is curved and the display is pretty nice. Its almost about to be a year since ive gotten the item and its still running strong without any problems. One bad thing about this monitor is that it does have a weird color spectrum to it so it might seem a bit more yellow instead of white if thats what bothers you
customer_reviews.author: adrian wang

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This a fantastic monitor! I am not a gamer. I use it for work, YouTube, pictures and videos. To me this was a great decision! Easy to adjust the picture. The curve is substantially better than I can explain. Just a very good monitor for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Harris

customer_reviews.title: Cheap for a reason
customer_reviews.text: Had a black right strip on the rightbside and it wasn’t my graphics card.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love Sceptre
customer_reviews.text: Just got this today, took me a couple minutes to set it up, works beautifully! I have always had Sceptre monitors and they have never disappointed me, I will continue to be a purchaser of this product :),cant wait to see it when i do my gaming rebuild with my Gigabyte 1080 G1. Thank you again Sceptre, Amazon and UPS for prompt delivery and another great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Moller-Hanson

customer_reviews.title: 2 MONITORS SO FAR BOTH SHOW DEAD PIXELS IN A FEW DAYS
customer_reviews.text: 2 MONITORS SO FAR BOTH SHOW DEAD PIXELS IN A FEW DAYS... I do the online test for dead pixels but they are still dead. going to return this one as well. it was fine but this after I see 4 spots where i had none before. Starting to feel i am getting refurbished monitors sent to me
customer_reviews.author: D. C. Black

customer_reviews.title: GREAT MONITOR
customer_reviews.text: Bought this monitor on prime day and it has been an absolute game changer. The quality of the picture is really good. Super responsive and easy to connect. I like the night time feature where it automatically turns into warm colors to rest your eyes if you are working later at night.
customer_reviews.author: Primova Pet Products

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a screen for gaming. I’ve been using the hdmi cord that came with it and it’s working perfectly. The box was a little rough when it arrived but everything inside was perfect. Installation was easy and the stand is very sturdy. I am using a card table and it works great. The quality is great. 32” is amazing and it looks bigger in person than in pictures. I’d highly reccomend this product to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Dalby

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with the product - Septre 32" curved
customer_reviews.text: Arrived today. Well packed and easy setup: 3 screws for the base (do the neck screws first), hdmi &power. Windows instantly recognized it and put recommended settings. Nice clear picture. My first time with a curved monitor, and I like the emersive feel. So far all really good. Thanks Septre!
customer_reviews.author: StuffBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for first major upgrade
customer_reviews.text: What's not to like honestly? It's extremely well priced... I'd say it's even a deal. Read reviews about the quality or color something but it looks fine. It's not super HD 4K amazing but in-game it looks as good as anything else. The curved feature is neat. And it might be a little too large for your setup this thing is big. The smaller version will likely lessen the amount of peripheral vision you have to use and moving of the eyes to see the corners. But I love it despite those things. I took away one star because it's not extremely great quality picture but still very good.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome at Home or in the office.
customer_reviews.text: I originally got this monitor for office use to add an extra screen, as the ones at my office weren't too great. But, this things clarity makes games look crisp. During downtime I play game on it and its gorgeous. I tested it with my xbox One, Ps4, and Nintendo switch...all looked great. Its got a HDMI, Display port, headphome jack, and a VGA so theres no shortage of connectivity here. For the price, and the size...you cant beat it. If your looking to take your cubicle or home office to the next level, and not trying to break bank....this is the way to go!
customer_reviews.author: Kamaal

customer_reviews.title: Was not like plug and play
customer_reviews.text: Curved, Worked fine, but I needed to adjust the presets to get it to look right. (normal) I almost sent it back, but after some experimentation I got it to look very nice. Built well and looks very nice. Pleasing. - not an English teacher so I wish I could describe it better.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Nicely Boxed with lots of protection
customer_reviews.text: PROS: Nicely Boxed with lots of protection. Matte Black Finish Screen Thin Metal Bezel 100x100 vesa mount HDMI, DISPLAY PORT, VGA Cons: Buttons on the back Short power cord $229!!!!! What a great looking curved display for this price. Very Happy Overall. Sceptre products are good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: I ABSOLUTELY LOVE THEM!
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased 4 of these 32" screens. I ABSOLUTELY LOVE THEM!!!! They are phenomenal for the price. I'd highly recommend them to anyone and everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Tomkus

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again for sure
customer_reviews.text: Very good monitor especially when paired with a high def vid card. it's no $300+ monitor, but then again, it's no $300+ monitor. Excellent buy for the money, good bang for the buck and all that. good clarity and with the curve, it actually appears bigger than you would think. very stable on the stand, no idea abut the wall mount.
customer_reviews.author: Isismayy Spradley

customer_reviews.title: Screen completely black
customer_reviews.text: I had this monitor for not even a month and it stopped working. The monitor has the blue light like it’s on but the screen is black with no back light or anything. Thought it might be my computer so I plugged the monitor to my laptop and it didn’t work there either. I’m very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Spohrrrr

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor for the price in its class
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant color and image. The curve screen certainly adds that magical third dimension to the viewing experience. I replaced my previous two 22" with one of these and it looks just awesome! less clutter on the desk and looks extremely pleasing and high tech. getting ready to get a 2nd one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality monitor
customer_reviews.text: Sceptre surprised me with this huge, curved, and crisp display-delivering model. For the type of use of and the quality packed in, I haven't seen value like this in many monitors before. I was incredibly, pleasantly surprised with this one.
customer_reviews.author: MCE

customer_reviews.title: Great picture, not many input connections
customer_reviews.text: The monitor has a great picture and works well for the gaming application we are using it for. Only downside, if any, is that there are not many ports on the unit so we had to get a splitter to select the input easier.
customer_reviews.author: B. C. Christopher

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Color seems a little off and text is blurry. But this is about what you expect for a 32" monitor at 1920x1080. However, it works great for me, as I sit several feet back from my monitor and this makes everything readable.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Reid

customer_reviews.title: Alright, but arrived with minor problems
customer_reviews.text: Screen is great, with some minor defects. It arrived with some minor light leaks around the bottom corner. Nothing huge unless screen is all black, but still enough to be worth a star. Otherwise response times and viewing angles are all great.
customer_reviews.author: matt r

customer_reviews.title: Easy working with this screen
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful curved screen for desktop. Amazing difference in readability with out constantly moving from side to side. Never really thought about a large curved screen for my computer. This one is the size of my first big screen TV several years back but curved. Nice.
customer_reviews.author: David L

customer_reviews.title: Let me say I didn't expect to get such awesome monitors for the amount of money that I paid
customer_reviews.text: Let me say I didn't expect to get such awesome monitors for the amount of money that I paid. I was impressed by the size and the curve. I bought 2 and I usually connect them to my laptop for dual display; I love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimani

customer_reviews.title: ... a few months back and my bf is in love with it to the point he asked me to ...
customer_reviews.text: i originally ordered this screen a few months back and my bf is in love with it to the point he asked me to get him another one. so i did.... .i hit the re order this item button and it was on its way. it got here and the box was smaller then the last one and then we got it all set up and then noticed the original screen frame is gray with the buttons on the right and the one we just recieved has a black frame with the buttons on the left.... not sure what happened considering i ordered the same item from the same seller both times.... kinda upsetting!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ajahner89

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor so far.
customer_reviews.text: When I first was looking for a monitor I wanted a curved one and around this size but I was skeptical because of the price. Then I saw how they mailed it and again was skeptical. After I got it home and took it out the box I was surprised how good it looked, the stand sucks tho. After I turned it on and started using it was was extremely happy how the picture looks. There are no dead pixels and the colors are pretty good. I ran a color calibrator and made some adjustments but the monitor is beyond my expectations. I have only had the monitor for 4 days but I am happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Teapacman

customer_reviews.title: Wow!!!
customer_reviews.text: This replaced my 27" Sceptre curved monitor. Problem was, it sat in the sealed box for 6 months. Why did I wait so long? Excellent monitor!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nojokes

customer_reviews.title: Pro Adjustments through videocard panel !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am totally pleased now that I have HD experience. I could not setup monitor well with the back side buttons. I have an NVidia card which has a control panel allowing detailed adjustments. Pursue this option if your setup is less than satisfactory. Wow!! What a difference. Otherwise physically a great Monitor and hopefully troublefree....
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Over two years later
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is going strong and still looks great. It isn't my main monitor but I would still buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: labarriere

customer_reviews.title: Love this screen -- perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Graphics are great, the slight curve is just right. Soon I will order a second and my work area will be extended a lot. :-) I have only had this a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Directec

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and the curve is exactly what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: I think the only complaint I actually have about this is that it is a little washed out with color. Modified the color settings to try and change that, but it's still washed out. Otherwise, this is well worth the price. Looks great and the curve is exactly what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Sean O.

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for around a year and its still going strong. I don't have any visible dead spots and I haven't had any screen burnin or related issues. Would recommend strongly especially for the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great picture for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure at first that I should buy this monitor. I have looked at other curved monitors like the Samsung. The price is a great selling point, so I went ahead and bought it. It is the newer 2018 model with the buttons on the right side. The package included an HDMI and VGA cable and a screwdriver to assemble the stand. The settings are are easyly done and the best user settings are Brightness at 48, Contrst at 50. As you see foron the picrures the resolution can be set pretty high and fall picture is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: John Holtz

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I switched to this from a 42” tv and I was amazed by the difference. Not so much picture quality as it was the same resolution and what not but the screen delay was virtually nonexistent. Great quality would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Peterson

customer_reviews.title: good value for CAD
customer_reviews.text: Decent screen for doing CAD as my primary monitor; not the highest resolution, but good enough and the price makes it a good value. I'm not doing any high-resolution rendering.
customer_reviews.author: R. Williams

customer_reviews.title: 32 Inch sleek curved table-top monitor
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good table-top monitor for the price paid. Everyone like to use it as soon as we bought it. Sleek design, pretty good foot, reasonable price. Going to sleep when it is needed. Turning knob on the back when you wake computer or turn it on fresh is not a problem (some people pointed out-that it is a big problem for them). It wakes up automatically if it is just a monitor (not computer) went to time-outed off.
customer_reviews.author: clawsomecrab

customer_reviews.title: The build quality on the exterior is excellent but what made me give it three stars is ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these monitors. The build quality on the exterior is excellent but what made me give it three stars is that one monitor's contrast ratio is different from the other. In equal settings one has a film of grey and the other one has rich blacks. I tried adjusting the color setting to make them match but really didn't help. Disappointing since these two monitors are next to each other, it's pretty obvious. Maybe if I purchased one I wouldn't be able to tell.
customer_reviews.author: Marino

customer_reviews.title: total rip off
customer_reviews.text: this monitor does not refresh well, constantly flickers when changing modes, has issues with windows 10 and many many games do not like it.
customer_reviews.author: NoMercy

customer_reviews.title: I won’t buy from this company again they don’t honor purchased warranty
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, screen cracked support wouldn’t warranty even though I paid for warranty
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it...You won't regret it!!!
customer_reviews.text: NOW THIS IS A GREAT COMPUTER MONITOR!!!!!!!!!! Great picture, built in speakers, sleek design. I'm a programmer, NOT A GAMER...for me this is perfect. In the pics, my samsung 24" curved screen looks like a baby. I think I'll use it vertically vs. getting another big screen. I couldn't be happier with my purchase for the price of this display. Buy it, you won't regret it!!
customer_reviews.author: jason gordon

customer_reviews.title: Major backlight bleed
customer_reviews.text: Avoid this monitor at all costs. There is a good 3/4" band of light bleed around the entire perimeter of the monitor, and it's very noticeable even on a lighter background.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor with full range of color
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor for the price. No problems with the screen and I can tell a significant difference between the monitor and the tv I used to use. I fully recommend and plan to buy another of my own
customer_reviews.author: Kaleb Posey

customer_reviews.title: Kind of surprised this is rated so high
customer_reviews.text: This monitor was very underwhelming. It's big. It's curved. That's cool... Outside of that, though... The colors are very bland and nothing really "pops". I did try adjusting settings for quite a while but nothing seemed to make things better. That was a big box to return!
customer_reviews.author: MACception

customer_reviews.title: I really liked the picture
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the picture. But it would keep cutting off. And would have to be re-booted. They sent me another one. But it did the same thing. I hate that. I really like the look and picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: jeff McElrath

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Very good product and excellent quality more affordable price than the local market I really recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Michele menelchenko & louis brown

customer_reviews.title: Good work monitor
customer_reviews.text: Good work monitor. I would not go with for serious gaming. For that go with a 2k res or up. Have the AOC 32" 2k, that thing is amazing for gaming. This isn't bad. Using it at work. Makes it easier to read at my desk with side by side windows open for multitasking.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Pls buy the 27 inch HD one
customer_reviews.text: Guys I made a mistake buying this one because nowhere does it say HD and that is apparent I am a gamer and the resolution is not very good by all means buy this as a workstation monitor for running basic programs DO NOT BUY FROR GAMING
customer_reviews.author: JENNY WATERS

customer_reviews.title: Believe the hype!
customer_reviews.text: I've had my monitor for about a month now, and for what i use it for its perfect. I also have the 27" curved and I love this brand and their curved monitors I'll never go back.
customer_reviews.author: Chrisii

customer_reviews.title: 3/4" of screen not working on right side of monitor. no hdmi cable
customer_reviews.text: quality assurance dropped the ball on this one. couldnt possibly have been tested.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I loved it so much that I bought a second one. The first one was from a different retailer. The only thing I wish is that the stand would not loosen so easily without any apparent reason
customer_reviews.author: Hope P. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as advertised and a great price. All of my co-workers comment about how impressive this monitor. I wish this thing had a security lock slot. I'm sure one of these suckers will try to swipe it. Haha.
customer_reviews.author: Seanookie

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boyfriend for Christmas. We both love it! It's a great upgrade. I don't know much of anything about techy specifics, but it is very big, we love the curved monitor, and it is super sleek and clean looking. I love the flexibility with the stand that it comes with. They put a lot of care into the packaging of this product so its safe to ship. Overall super happy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great size and price.  Wow
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for the price good size nice curved monitor pretty good resolution for everyday use not sure about game as they get very particular but I think it's great
customer_reviews.author: big lou

customer_reviews.title: Just the right amount of curves.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good looking display. Out of the box the color was a little dull and too warm for a monitor. After going through the settings it brightened up nicely. The curve is not necessary, but is just too cool to pass up at this price!
customer_reviews.author: J. Lee

product_meta.title: Sceptre C325W-1920R 32" 1800R Curved Monitor 1080P HDMI DisplayPort Ultra Thin Build-in Speakers, Metal Black
product_meta.description: With the C325W-1920R, a revolutionary curved display with a leading 1800R screen curvature delivers images that appear to wrap around you, providing an in-depth, immersive experience. Combined with an Ultra slim design, take in the wider field of view. Protection and comfort are the hallmarks of this design as the metal Pattern brush finish is smooth and pleasing to the touch. The metal halo Stand strikes the perfect balance between durability and design. 1080P resolution (1920 x 1080 pixels) provides stunning color and picture detail on a 32 inch screen. A 5 millisecond response time displays action sequences with the highest Degree of clarity. Enjoy HDMI, VGA and DisplayPort inputs to connect all video and gaming devices. Power Range AC Adapter Input: 100 – 240V~ 50/60Hz, 1. 0A Output: 12V DC, 3. 33A. The brightness is 311 cd/m2
feature_bullets: 1800R curved monitor. OS Compatibility- Windows 10, Windows 8, Windows 7, macOS High Sierra, macOS Sierra, OS X El Capitan
Blue light shift;Contemporary Sleek Metal Design
VESA wall mount pattern. Without stand (inch): 28.38 x 16.61 x 0.35
Mounting type: VESA Mount (mm)600*400mm. Dynamic Contrast Ratio 12,000 : 1

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars672 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
